infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to help you practice speaking and record your sessions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio for your speaking practice sessions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app saves your practice recordings to your photo library so you can review them later.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SpeechCoach to access your camera to record practice sessions.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow SpeechCoach to access your microphone to record audio for practice sessions.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SpeechCoach to save your practice recordings to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow SpeechCoach to save your practice recordings to your photo library.
